name: BEAM-AI
description: An image colorizer built on Deep AI's technology
about: A colorizer application build on Deep AI technology that transforms your old black and white photos into beautiful colorized photos that you can share with friends and loved ones.

name: WAPIDOC WEB
description: A location based, healthcare listing platform.
about: A platform that connects the physical and digital world by providing easy and efficient access to health care providers, services and products with the push of a button.

name: WAPIDOC APP
description: A location based, healthcare listing mobile app.
about: A mobile app that allows users/patients to find healthcare providers, services and products closest to them with helpful information to make the right decisions.

name: CASPAD
about: An AI-driven platform that analyses poor/high-quality audio/video data, using moderated engines and converts it into clean accurate transcriptions/captions.
